name: suvera/winter-doctrine
description: Doctrine ORM/DBAL Support in the Winterboot framework

suggest.ext-pdo_sqlite: For using SQLite with Doctrine ORM
suggest.ext-pdo_mysql: For using MySQL with Doctrine ORM
suggest.ext-pdo_pgsql: For using PostgreSQL with Doctrine ORM
suggest.ext-pdo_sqlsrv: For using SQL Server with Doctrine ORM
suggest.ext-pdo_oci: For using Oracle with Doctrine ORM
